project: Examples of the 3D objects created in collaboration with the British Museum, the National Museum of Australia, and the School of Archaeology&Anthropology at the ANU can be seen here: https://sketchfab.com/tmtn/collections
There is a working prototype for the JazzCats (Jazz Collection of Aggregated Triples) project available at http://jazzcats.cdhr.anu.edu.au/
